examples: The play was too funny for words.
He always tells funny jokes that make everyone laugh.
I saw some really funny pictures of myself as a kid and I couldn't believe what a minger I was.
She imagined kids making funny faces after trying scorzonera for the first time.
We spent the evening watching funny movies and she felt much better.
words.defineVi: có thể làm cho mọi người cười

examples: The movie was hilarious.
A clumsy chef accidentally spills ingredients, knocks over pots, and slips on the floor, creating a hilarious comedy of errors in the kitchen.
These kids are hilarious.
My mom is hilarious.
This thing is hilarious.
words.defineVi: gây ra niềm vui lớn và tiếng cười

examples: You’re just silly.
Stop inventing silly excuses.
It was a classic example of the saying 'ask a silly question and get a silly answer.'
When his friends teased him about his silly hat, he laughed along and played along with the joke.
It was a classic example of the saying 'ask a silly question and get a silly answer.'
words.defineVi: cảm thấy xấu hổ hoặc ngu ngốc

examples: The movie was as boring as they come.
It’s so boring, eating the same food day in, day out.
I have to do the same boring jobs day in day out.
The child nodded off to sleep during the boring lecture.
This course seemed right up my alley when I signed up for it, but it ended up being dreadfully boring.
words.defineEn: making us feel tired and unsatisfied because of not being interesting
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy mệt mỏi và không hài lòng vì không thú vị

examples: She really is weird, unsympathetic and is useless for the better part of the movie.
A: "Who's that weird guy standing in the corner?"
Audiograms are weird.
The end of the season gets weird.
This texture is weird.
words.defineEn: very strange, unusual, and not natural, in a way that is difficult to understand
words.defineVi: rất lạ, khác thường và không tự nhiên, theo cách khó hiểu

examples: That sound of the chopper blades is unforgettable.
We had an unforgettable time.
Another famous example is the actress Marilu Henner, who appeared on the TV show TAXI, then became an advisor for Unforgettable.
Every night around sunset, they head out to eat, and it’s an unforgettable sight.
That's partly because of its unforgettable soundtrack, which included disturbing experimental compositions that went on to shape the way horror scores and soundtracks sound, even to this day.
words.defineEn: so memorable that being forgotten is impossible
words.defineVi: đáng nhớ đến mức không thể nào quên được

examples: Its depiction of a class war aboard a high tech train rocketing around a ruined earth is as thought-provoking as it is thrilling.
Each image more miraculous and thought-provoking and awe-inspiring than pretty much anything you’ll find in a museum.
words.defineEn: causing one to seriously think about a certain subject or to consider it
words.defineVi: khiến một người suy nghĩ nghiêm túc về một chủ đề nhất định hoặc xem xét nó

examples: One day, after years of violent abuse from her husband, she took the law into her own hands.
Solving violent crimes is all in a day's work for these police detectives.
There are reports of a violent incident involving local inhabitants and U.S. troops.
When the leaders of the protest movement became violent, they played right into the hands of the police.
On the third day the weather broke and they had a violent storm.
words.defineEn: using or involving physical force that is intended to damage, harm, or kill
words.defineVi: sử dụng hoặc liên quan đến vũ lực nhằm mục đích gây thiệt hại, làm hại hoặc giết
